mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, a.category, a.author, a.source, a.views, a.font_size AS fontSize, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM articles a WHERE a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles (title, author, source, content, category, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{source}, #{content}, #{category}, #{created_at}, #{updated_at})
mapper.update: UPDATE articles SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, category = #{category}, created_at = #{created_at}, updated_at = #{updated_at} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, category, created_at, updated_at, author, source, views, font_size FROM articles WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM articles ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
